name: border-length
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
Report length of borders.

For each border, print its length along the surface, in mm.  If a border has multiple parts, their lengths are summed before printing, unless -separate-pieces is specified.

The -corrected-areas option is intended for when the length is not meaningfully measurable on individual surfaces, it is only an approximate correction for the reduction in structure of a group average surface.

inputs.name: surface
inputs.description: the surface to measure the borders on

inputs.name: opt_corrected_areas_area_metric
inputs.description: vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the surface: the corrected vertex areas, as a metric

inputs.name: opt_separate_pieces
inputs.description: report lengths for multi-part borders as separate numbers

inputs.name: opt_hide_border_name
inputs.description: don't print border name before each output
